onOFTReceived(uint16,bytes,uint64,bytes3.details: Called by the OFT contract when tokens are received from source chain.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to transfer.
params._from: The address of the account who calls the sendAndCall() on the source chain.
params._nonce: The nonce of the transaction on the source chain.
params._payload: Additional data with no specified format.
params._srcAddress: The address of the OFT token contract on the source chain.
params._srcChainId: The chain id of the source chain.
